properties.name: elastic.apm.enabled
properties.description: A boolean to enable attaching the Elastic APM Agent.

properties.name: elastic.apm.service-name
properties.description: The service name to register with the Elastic APM Server.

properties.name: elastic.apm.secret-token
properties.description: The token to register with the Elastic APM Server.

properties.name: elastic.apm.environment
properties.description: The environment tag to add to the service on the Elastic APM Server.

properties.name: elastic.apm.application-packages
properties.description: Packages the Elastic APM Agent should scan and report on.

properties.name: elastic.apm.log-level
properties.description: The log level the Elastic APM Agent should use. Possible values are: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, or ERROR.
